itunes:title: Episode 386 - Is This Russia-lite?
title: Episode 386 - Is This Russia-lite?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, Evan Hafer, and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest Rallycar champion Steve Arpin as they discuss Russia taking over social media to divide the country and the roles of responsibility that Twitter and Faceboo...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, Evan Hafer, and Dan Hollaway are joined by special guest Rallycar champion Steve Arpin as they discuss Russia taking over social media to divide the country and the roles of responsibility that Twitter and Facebook won't own up to. Evan goes on one his most epic rants yet.
